Class NumberSquare

java.lang.Object
Square
NumberSquare
public class NumberSquare
extends Square
NumberSquare is a square that can have nieghboring mines

      public NumberSquare​(int neighborMines, int myRow, int myCol)

      neighborMines - the number of mines in a 3x3 area around the square
      myRow - the row number
      myCol - the col number

  • Method Details

      public boolean uncover()
      uncover uncovers the square and sets the elements to either the neighboring mines or - if there are no neighbors

      Returns:
